item.title: Database Modeling with Ecto: Part 1
item.description: Creating your first records Contents Relational modelling in Ecto Ecto Schema Fundamentals Relational modelling in Ecto You’ve heard of elixir and are just getting started with your first taste of the kool-aid. If you’re new to Elixir, you’re probably finding ecto to be a bit of a culture shock. Ecto is an immensly powerful library for working with sql but Unlike other ORMs you may have used, Ecto embraces what makes sql great.
